title: Can't find out what my mystery skin gift is
body: I received a mystery gift, but it went to fast that i could not click on it and i do not know what it is

replies.body: I had the same issue. I just closed the client and opened it again and it worked for me.

Toasts are being tested in the updated version, so you might see a backlog of notifications you've already received.  This is stuff like icons or mystery gift messages. Let me know if that clears things up!
